website_summaries.verdict: The best mid-range soundbar available delivers crisp and clear audio for a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Richer Fuller Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound bar to complement by Sony Bravia TV. Having read the write ups, I purchased a HDMI cable so that the TV remote would control both units. Having carefully followed the instructions, no matter what I tried I could not get any sound out of the sound bar. After some hours, I discovered an instruction in the TV manual which stated that the Bravia Sync mode should be enabled. The sound bar immediately started working. There is no mention of this in the sound bar's manual! The sound is much improved from the TV speakers with clearer speech and better sound all round. I gave it 4 stars because of the missing instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not worth Black Friday price, certainly not worth anywhere near RRP
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product, sound wasn't great to start - it was passable but hardly work the £100+ RRP. Tried to turn it on this morning after using it for one movie and nothing but buzzing, the next morning it refused to acknowledge the TV and while the Bluetooth function did work it sounded like it was playing underneath a swamp
customer_reviews.author: Stigweird85

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but could not achieve HDMI ARC connection!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 Bravia (model 8396) and could not connect this with a HDMI ARC. Tried 2 different leads, the TV recognising sound bar presence but could not get any sound from bar. Went through TV settings and ‘Bravia Sync’ but noted that the bar model number wasn’t listed. Have now connected with the supplied optical cable and the bar is working! Sound is good with better stereo than tv speakers but I now have another remote for my collection. I have a Sky Q box and a PS4 connected to same tv so maybe these affecting HDMI ARC connection. So pleased with sound for £69! But lack of HDMI ARC connection has influenced my rating
customer_reviews.author: Paddy O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Having got fed up of my old man having his TV volume constantly set to maximum I bought this soundbar to minimise the risk of next door punching through the wall to strangle him. The soundbar was easy to set up. I put the sound quality onto 'Auto Sound' and left him to switch it on over christmas. He switched the TV on, pressed the volume 'Up' button a couple of times, changed the channel over to a Western movie when I heard 'F****** Hell!! That bullet was loud!' before reducing the volume to a reasonable level. Very Happy with the soundbar. Also paired to Amazon Alexa, so John Denver can now be heard singing in the living room!
customer_reviews.author: SB2K

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Sound bar was reduced from £150 to £93.......now I know why. Sound is very poor and the pre set sounds on the remote have very little variation, Sony's description says "Powerful surround sound thanks to S-Force front surround and bass reflex unit"...nah, I don't think so. (This was connected to a Sony smart TV with an HDMI ARC cable) The TV's own speakers sound better than the sound bar and yes I did go through every combination on the tv set, up but still no improvement to the sound bar quality .
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Really poor sound and no features to make it any better
customer_reviews.text: I really wouldn't recommend this as a proper sound bar speaker. It's great for making a flat TV sound better and clearer, but it brings in ZERO bass. It also has no features on the remote to change the sound to make it better, and no LCD screen or decent app connectivity so you're kind of flying dark and choosing the options like 'film' 'voice' etc to see what sounds better. It also goes high and low during scenes when people are talking / there's some action so you're turning the volume up and down a lot to hear the show. I was using HDMI arc, and that's a nifty feature but overall I wouldn't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. Gill

customer_reviews.title: No cable management
customer_reviews.text: The sound is Meh at best through TV . No bass controller to speak of . But then what can you expect for this price rage. Sounds fuller and richer when connected via Bluetooth and playing music . My major gripe with this soundbar is there is no real place to hide the wires behind the unit when wall mounting it. If you don't have the mounting screws far enough in then the unit droops down. When you do have them in enough then this leaves no room to hide the wires as most people would want to have the wires coming from the middle of the unit and not either end as with this. Very Bad design Sony.
customer_reviews.author: oatcake

customer_reviews.title: Improves
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar is well made and looks good under the Sony 49 inch TV it improves the sound quality by cutting out the very top frequencies that causes some of the speech to be very annoying the bass is a small improvement could have been better and it has a good level of volume output. The remote has four sound modes Cinema - Music - Voice - Standard. I found the Cinema the best mode .For the price it does improve the quality of the sound if you want hi-fi sound this will not give you that you would have to pay a lot - lot more.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my Sony Bravia tv and it has improved the sound. I have the different modes and my daughters Disney films sound great on cinematic. I haven’t tried the Bluetooth option yet but music on the tv sounds really crisp. It also has a night mode which seems to remove the base to stop the sound travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It's Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I only received his item on 23rd October. Initially it was working but after about a week it developed a kind of crackling in the sound that needed the system to be switched off and on again before it was working properly. It's done the same thing quite a few times now. A few days ago it started to switch itself off, leaving just the TV speaker providing sound. Last night it would not switch on at all. Lights show on the front of it but no sound is coming from the TV unless I use the TV speaker. Totally unacceptable. I will be returning this item and looking for another speaker.
customer_reviews.author: hillsmith

customer_reviews.title: No sound
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the worst purchases I have ever bought, the instructions are basic enough, however the bar itself as as easy to set up as reading is through muddy water, purchased as an xmas box , this item some 3 weeks later has yet to provide any sound, coaxial cable purchased as most if not all sound bars need one( notthis one) so another £10 spent on an HDMI cable , only to find still no sound , stay clear , buy something that actually works, aweful truly aweful
customer_reviews.author: Bri Davison

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: No cables (optical/hdmi) in the box were supplied so I used an quality HDMI cable of my own. The soundbar turned on fine, the remote worked fine, zero sound. Connected via Bluetooth to my phone, no sound. Connected via Bluetooth to my iPad, no sound. Connected via HDMI to 3 different TVs. No sound. Really disappointing and a waste of two hours of my life. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bellyobibblybob

customer_reviews.title: Poor bass and overall sound
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the sound quality on this, so it’s going straight back for a refund. No bass whatsoever, the speakers built in to the 55” Sony TV this was meant for, are considerably better. And that’s not saying a lot. No adjustments to speak of to adjust. Volume is very good, Sound quality as far as clarity of the sound is good, not muffled, but there’s just something weak and tinny about the sound. Very disappointed. TV speaker is genuinely better.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Nice bass and no glaring LED's while your trying to watch TV.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a faulty sound bar. This one is much better with clearer sound and better bass. The remote is great and has options for voice, music or film or hit auto and let the sound bar decide. Nice weight to it and sits firmly in front of the TV, but low down enough so it doesn't get in the way. The best thing is the lights on the front only show when pressing the the buttons on the remote so you don't have a glaring red/blue LED shining in your face while trying to watch TV. Would have got 5 stars but the price could have been a little bit lower.
customer_reviews.author: Neil.A

customer_reviews.title: Strong & Stable
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly under a 55 inch Sony Bravia TV. The sound quality of this thing is definitely worth the price so I don’t quite understand the 1-Star reviews, what were you expecting? This soundbar is great. And for anyone pairing the soundbar with the PS4, the Slim variant does NOT have an optical cable input so you must use HDMI (ARC) if you want for this to work and make sure to avoid Bitstream (Dolby/DTS) on the ‘Audio Output Settings’ on the console as the delay of sound is very much noticeable. Keep the Audio Format on ‘Linear PCM’ just so the video on screen properly syncs with the soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: Should always check package when it arrives
customer_reviews.text: Suppose thats what you get for buying in advance, been currently building an extension to my house. And I knew I'd need a soundbar eventually so bought one as it was on offer. I then made the mistake of not opening the box when it had arrived, busy household 3 kids middle of an extension build. It just got thrown into cupboard under the stairs. Now Just over 2 months since I bought it, I've went to fit it and there is no power cable 🤬 Ive learnt the hard way. Suppose another cable can be bought but that's not the point
customer_reviews.author: PhilK

customer_reviews.title: Muffled sound
customer_reviews.text: This looks good and it's easy to set up but the sound is really poor. I understand this is an 'entry level' device but I was expecting better sound from a Sony product retailing at at £150. The sound is very muffled in all preset sound options with both bass and treble rather absent. I was expecting a far richer crisper sound. I don't understand all the previous reviewers who found this soundbar so impressive and amazing... Now it's becoming so difficult returning this to amazon as the item and it's box are so bulky and heavy. Nigthmare experience :(
customer_reviews.author: Londoner

customer_reviews.title: Sound nowhere near TV sound quality (55” smart Sony)
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this, the sound was awful, worse than the TV (Sony 55”), mid range to low frequencies were totally gone after connecting it. I probably would have kept if it was easy to have sound coming from the TV plus the sound bar but that was a real hassle. Retuned it s although had hassle as the guy at the Hermes return shop said it was too big (after checking dimensions later, I believe he was not being honest). Amazon arranged for Hermes to pick it up from my house but they just turned up out the blue, lucky I was at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bezos

customer_reviews.title: Very good—maybe 5 stars with better tv than we have
customer_reviews.text: I think if I had a newer tv I might give this 5 stars. The sound is for the most part very good. It works well with our 5 year old Panasonic, but I think it is geared more to newer HDTV and 4k surround sound experiences, as there is a bit of an echo with older dvds. The remote works pretty well, but sometimes I need to press commands a few times to get a response. Again, I suspect it is possible that the tv is not quite new enough for perfection here. So my real rating is 4-5 stars. Easy to set up. Also has troubleshooting directions available online, which I have used.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds
customer_reviews.text: Once I managed to connect to my turn table it sounds excellent, someone wrote that the voice, cinema, music etc on remote all sounded the same but I can assure you it makes a lot of difference on each one you press and ond the night mode gives it more bass. Absolutely delighted with it, if you get trouble connecting another item (TV etc) via Bluetooth always make sure they are as very close as can be, within an inch I'd say. But definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Colin56

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to upgrade from standard built in TV speakers. First the look of this soundbar is very simple and clean. It is super easy to set up and use, it can be paired with a fire stick and the TV to allow for one button to turn on/off all three devices. The sound from this soundbar gives a great boost to all forms of media, movies/music/games. Has a great balance to the audio with easy controls to change the range to suit the media you are using. Overall a great soundbar for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jopo97

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: Second try at a soundbar. First one was not much different to the TV speakers but this one is great. The bass is much better and easy to control via the remote. Was very easy to setup and great that it all works from the Sky Q remote. Overall very happy with it and the quality of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd & Maite

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately did'nt make much difference to my LG TV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Sony Soundbar in the hope of improving the sound quality of my LG TV, and hoped that it would provide some form of resonance, but unfortunately it hardly makes any difference to that of my TV. I appreciate that for £99 you cant expect the moon on a stick, and to be fair my TV does have reasonable sound by default, so this Soundbar is probably more suited to older Flat-panel TVs where the sound quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Waz H

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I like Sony and have a more expensive fantastic sound system in main room. I bought this for conservatory and at £90 did not expect much. However I like it. The sound for music and films is very good again for price. Could do with a subwoofer to give a bit of vava voom but for a smaller room its ok. Worth the money. Easy to set up and remote no problem. (They supply optical cable, but I had a spare Hdmi lead that I feel is slightly better on sound )
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul T

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: IF you are thinking to buy this sound bar, don't buy then. Very poor sound quality. Got the first one automatically turn off every 15 mins (no matter how big you put your sound volume up). Replaced another one, the base is not even, it won't stand steadily on the table. Totally wasting money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sun

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar, easy to set up, easy to use and great sound through either TV or playing music from bluetoothed phone connection, onlydown side is getting the sound balance right when switching from Bluetooth music back to TV, remember to turn the volume right down!!! Otherwise it will make you jump
customer_reviews.author: lasvegas

customer_reviews.title: Oompf
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents because the speakers in their TV sound awful. Sounds so much better. Has some oompf to it too. Remote is easy to use. Connected to my phone easily and quickly via bluetooth when I tried out spotify. Only downside is that the optical cable it came with is shorter than a T-rex's arm, and only just reaches the back of the TV
customer_reviews.author: Nicc83

customer_reviews.title: Sounds perfect !
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little sound bar that works very well with my Sony TV but can also be used for external sources as well as Bluetooth. My only issue is that the power lead attaches to the right hand side of the box and my socket was to the left of the soundbar, so I bought a new figure-of-eight cable to tidy that up. Otherwise, no issues; just does a great job !
customer_reviews.author: ianp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound output at a very reasonable price. Vast improvement on the built in tv speakers. If you are looking for high end sound output this is perhaps not for you. But if you are looking for a good balanced output for the average home, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: rickvic

customer_reviews.title: The Jury is still out????
customer_reviews.text: Most disappointing issue with this Soundbar is that for some inexplicable reason it switches itself off??? This was reported by other purchasers of the product, but I purchased because of the "Overall" feedback, BUT if this issue keeps happening I will return it to Amazon. The overall sound quality is also disappointing considering it is SONY, It was half price at £75, but that has absolutely nothing to do with the Sony quality? Unless they already know there is an issue with the Soundbar?
customer_reviews.author: David Paul Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says on the lid
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product especially from Sony. The sound quality was very poor and it does not perform as it should. The product has been returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: good value, easy to install, just switch on the "Cinema" setting on your tv
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought years ago as can now hear what people are saying on the telly without having to keep turning the volume up and down. Easy to install, just plug in and off you go - you just have to switch on the "cinema" function on your tv which confused me for a while as i had not done this before. Luckily I still had the instruction booklet kept in my Man Drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Scortonphil

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure far more expensive soundbars are superior but I bet not by much. I have attached it by HDMI ARC to my Samsung smart tv and it knocks spots off the standard tv speakers which point to the wall between next door. I found the way to get the best sound is to bring up the volume on the soundbar using its own remote and then reduce and set the right sound level using the TV remote. No idea why but it works that way to make speech clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase, sound is improved.
customer_reviews.text: Not the most expensive sound bar but it is an improvement on TV speakers. Bought Sony again to minimise any connection / compatibility issues working with our Sony Blu Ray player and TV. Setup was easy using HDMI ARC connection. It hangs under TV using extension to VISA wall mount which I bought previously. Please be aware there is no 3.5 mm headphone input if this is a requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur, Lord Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Soundbar Makes the best of NETFLIX
customer_reviews.text: The sound on the television did not give adeqate volume for the hard of hearing. Embarassment led to rejection of personal earphones. The Sound Bar gave a much improve tone to broadcast sound and the volume could be adjusted to adquate levels for all viewers. Our Christmas presents included a subscription to NETFLIX. The Sound Bar made listening to "Suits" a pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: Norov

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the recipient was delighted. Works seemlessly with the Sony Bravia TV. Connection was easy and straightforward and the sound quality is very good. It even connects to Apple products via Bluetooth (not usual in our experience with non Apple products) so it can be used to play music etc from iPads/iPhones. All round well worth the money paid and would highly recommend if you want a basic, good sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Liber Vermis

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant but not suitable
customer_reviews.text: Sounded excellent and remote was better than expected but I had to return due to lip sync problem on my Hisense Roku tv. I altered settings on the bar, tv and sky q box but couldn’t get it right. I’ve read this can be a problem with sound bars in general sometimes and doesn’t necessarily mean it would do it for everyone. Seems it’s more to do with the combination of equipment your connecting together. I only wanted to connect it via optical as I need all available hdmi ports for other equipment but maybe it would have worked better hooked up via hdmi arc.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaP

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a soundbar for his PS4 setup....found this to be the best quality for the price point. Doesn’t compare to the Sonos sound system, but for the price point it delivers good quality sound with acceptable bass. Looks well built...comes with an optical cable...does the job but far from the best quality. Overall my son is really pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound bar. I matched it with a Sony Bravia smart tv and it works relatively well. Good sound if a little light on bass. Lip synch is a bit hit and miss. Easy to set up, just plugged a hdmi cable into the ARC socket and connected it to the mains and away you go. No hdmi cable supplied only an optical.
customer_reviews.author: Solon

customer_reviews.title: better than TV sound
customer_reviews.text: purchased one of these as the audio on my TV became distorted, much better sound that the existing TV speakers, although volume levels can vary between TV inputs (which never really happened using internal TV speakers) also occasionally the unit turns itself off as you are changing volume (when changing via TV remote)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound but...
customer_reviews.text: I love Sony products. Normally I don't even discuss its sound or image quality or even the finishing manufacture standards. I bought this product mainly because I had a horrible experience trying to buy a cheaper soundbox and I ended up returning it. This one is a fair deal considering its price, but I confess that I was expecting more subwoofer quality. Overall, I'm happy with my product and I won't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Alek UK

customer_reviews.title: HDMI cable
customer_reviews.text: had trouble with set up but worked after third set of HDMI cable only my best cable worked on this device the cables are ok on other devices,it the Sony sound bar is picky on cables would be an item to supply a HDMI cable with the item,when set up sound is great through arc and product works every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much better than the TV sound it was supposed to improve
customer_reviews.text: The terrible, tinny sound from this soundbar is only marginally better than the terrible, tinny built-in TV speakers it was supposed to improve. Makes you long for the good old days before flat screen TVs; at least there was room for decent speakers in those big boxes. Returned for a refund - hooray for Amazon's no-quibbles return policy!
customer_reviews.author: OleH

customer_reviews.title: Distinctly below average sound.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cheap, easy to install, looks pretty good. Cons: Doesn't sound as good as my TVs built in speakers (although it is a fair bit louder). Brought this to connect to a budget Toshiba 58 inch 4k smart tv since the tv didnt sound as good as the Samsung it replaced. Unfortunately the soundbar doesn't sound as good as either tv. Probably just going to stick it on a bookshelf and use as a Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with this soundbar. A decent upgrade form TV.
customer_reviews.text: I had a logik soundbar before (around £40) and the bass was overpowering and it didn't have a hdmi input. This soundbar was affordable, had a hdmi input and sounds good. It wakes up with the TV and I can just use the same remote which is handy. The Bluetooth is also good for streaming from my phone whilst working from home. If you're looking for a budget soundbar I'd definitely give this a go! The bass may seem a little bit weak but I feel it has a good balance for my personal taste.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherb91

customer_reviews.title: Works best for Sony tv with "arc" hdmi connection.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a difference to the sound quality of the TV. As both are manufactured by Sony, the tv remote can control both. And our Sky remote can also control the volume. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Prem Gajree

customer_reviews.title: Poor volume.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the soundbar which I thought would be a neat and tidy replacement for my home sound system. It was easily fitted and a lot neater than my floor mounted speakers. However, the volume was poor, particularly so when watching SD channels. Returned it for a refund and now back to my original system.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Poor metallic sound.
customer_reviews.text: Poor metallic sound quality. I bought it to enhance my smart TV's sound and it ended up having worse quality than the TV speakers. Disappointed will be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitris P.

customer_reviews.title: Great...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. Connected to an old TV with sky box. Should have been easy to set up and was once I worked out the correct cable to use. Makes a terrific difference and improvement to sound quality. I really love the wireless feature so can easily listen to radio or music instead of TV. I was using a Bose dock but no need to anymore and prides a louder sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Chippington

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend a soundbar if your tv doesn't have a flat wall behind it. Even if it does, you'll get much clearer audio with a soundbar. This one won't replace a surround sound system with a subwoofer, but it does the job and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but good
customer_reviews.text: Not hi fi but so much better than the sound from the tv. Very easy to install if your set has an HDMI output. It is basic but good value. Sadly you have preset sound controls and no way of customising the sound. Also no way to add a subwoofer so four stars rather than five.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gareth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good soundbar if the arc hdmi connection did not fail
customer_reviews.text: originally very pleased and rated 5*. But after some months the hdmi on the arc Channel stopped working. Bought two replacement cables but made no difference! So not the quality I thought it was. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: john harris

customer_reviews.title: Sony HT-SF150 2ch Single Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Well Ordered late one day arrived by the following day Products by Sony are really good but this has really enhanced the sound quality from my television. Highly recommend this unit from Sony. A first class service from Amazon Thank You all
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peter A. Blount

customer_reviews.title: looks great sounds even better
customer_reviews.text: for the cost you can find much better speakers. i bought them simply for the look and to free up the space multiple speakers would take. the Bluetooth is very choppy and weird, the usb is also similar the sound doesn't come out synced and clear. however with optical cable sounds just right.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound just quiet and doesn’t live up to the name
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but although the sound quality is passable it isn’t very loud and doesn’t really show its potential. Sad as usually a big fan of Sony products and you can never really go wrong it this brand... sad!! The search for sound goes on
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value soundbar, I listen to spotify via bluetooth from my mobile phone and I have a memory stick in the back of the speaker with all my MP3 albums on, the sound quality is far better than my 49" Sony Bravia 4K android TV
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tobin

customer_reviews.title: No bass whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas to upgrade the sound from the standard TV speakers, highs and mids are fine and it gets loud, but there is absolutely no bass and sounds very tinny as a result. Wasn't expecting much for the price but still very disappointing, sent back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sony soundbar, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase of this Sony soundbar. There are much more expensive ones on the market, but for the price I think it's hard to beat the quality that this soundbar offers. Plus, it's straightforward to install.
customer_reviews.author: stephen huggins

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound however when using Bluetooth function the sound is so loud, wish there was a way of setting the level
customer_reviews.author: coldpepper65

customer_reviews.title: Smart
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install, the sound for music from bluetooth is great and certainly loud enough for our household! For the tv, it makes the sound very clear but wouldn't say it is loud! Would recommend though, looks very smart.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to improve the average sound quality on my TV. Delighted with the product - could not be easier to install and gave instant results on the TV sound. Add to this super-fast delivery and you have a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: hammie

customer_reviews.title: Great Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to spend so much on a soundbar but decided to trust that Sony wouldn't let me down and they haven't! Great sound quality, easy to set up with a TV or use through Bluetooth, remote control has all you need on it... very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time undamaged, I struggled with the installation, although this may have been due to my age! The improvement in sound I thought was well worth the money. Even though my Sony TV is eight years old I was fortunate that I could connect the sound bar with the optical cable supplied. Had that not been possible I would have had to purchase a HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: David Graves

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't got a very new tv don't bother as it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacks the punch
customer_reviews.text: It's a good value for money soundbar for £99 but compared to my Yamaha soundbar this lacks any serious punch. East to instal and mount with decent sound quality to amplify tv sound. That's about it.
customer_reviews.author: SuperG

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, good sounds.
customer_reviews.text: Nice balanced sound, surprising bass for the size. Won't sound much different to your TV speakers at lower volumes, but turn it up while watching a movie or playing a video game and you can notice the much improved dynamic range and clarity. Nice, subtle looks. Blends in well with the TV and stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Birrell

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but not the best
customer_reviews.text: It is a vast improvement on the Sony tv speakers. However it was not that simple to integrate with the DVD player and Amazon fire stick on my tv. At the moment I’m can’t use the fire stick until I get a hdmi splitter
customer_reviews.author: Beamo

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was expecting much more of the front surround system. Returned it and bought a 4.1 with no wires to the rear speakers. Slightly more expensive but worth the money to get real sorround.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing soundbar.
customer_reviews.text: I received this Sony soundbar on Sunday and have returned it after two days for a refund. As with the other reviewers who gave this a low rating, I agree that the sound is very tinny with no bass. I also couldn't get it working with HDMI CEC so that the soundbar turned on and off with the TV. Very disappointed with this Sony product!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and set up was easy, shame about the sound though. Maybe I was expecting too much based on the other reviews but the sound isnt great, overly harsh mid tones and tinny, very little bass, everyone in the house agreed that the internal speakers of our LG TV (lj594v) sound much nicer. Tried with Hdmi, optical and bluetooh and the same issue with all inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: My partner bought this, sounds really good and now movie watching is really enjoyable no more turning up at quiet talking and turning down S loud action scenes! Very good and I’m not really techy ether but I can use it so it must be easy to use lol
customer_reviews.author: Tansy arnett

customer_reviews.title: First time buying a soundbar, great Soundbar not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a soundbar, wanted to enhance our new tv's sound, first product we received was faulty and would not turn on, easily returned and yesterday received the replacement. Great sound options and very easy set up, nice to have the remote but our tv remote also works with the soundbar. Really smart looking design and fits great in front of the tv screen. Great price point will potentially be buying another for our second TV
customer_reviews.author: bry123

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic item as I knew nothing about sound bars but the sound on the TV was so poor even on 100 percent I had to get a sound bar hopping for the best and what a wonderful one to choose so easy to install. It was a bit bigger then expected but other then this it has great sound and so glad I got it! No hassle just plug into the TV and go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality so much better now we have this! Sound is crystal clear. Easy to use via Bluetooth. Very easy to set up. Excellent value. Great looking product - nice and neat. Not bulky at all. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sylvianrhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great device for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Considering all the options and frame of prices, this is perfect for home. It looks good, its easy to use and it sounds excellent (for a big living room). Highly recommendable!
customer_reviews.author: ADGOM

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is just not there.
customer_reviews.text: Odds are, your TV sound quality is actually better, as strange as that sounds, as long as your TV is of decent quality to begin with. It is not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Sony Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Good, adjustable soundbar connected easily to my LG 43 inch TV.It would have received 5 stars for all, except i can not use my TVs remote to adjust the sound. I dont know if there is a fault in the Sony remote or my brain as i have followed the instructions to the letter and will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: ayeyup

customer_reviews.title: Ok at the price
customer_reviews.text: An improvement over my Panasonic TVs own speakers but no quite as good as I hoped. I think you have to pay a lot more for the best sound quality such as B and O
customer_reviews.author: alligator crawl

customer_reviews.title: OK BUT BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: Sound now better . Placing sound bar in front of tv can block link to tv remote control . Behind tv then better . Ensure all leads are long enough . Surprised that all the leads are not supplied with the bar .
customer_reviews.author: boltok

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Terribly tinny sound. No bass or adjustment available. Irrespective of how you alter the sound on your tv the bar does its own thing. Not really compatible with the 55’ Sony Bravia HD TV. RETURNED
customer_reviews.author: David Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good sound bar
customer_reviews.text: This Sony soundbar looks very nice and although fairly basic compared with other more expensive models it has improved the sound of my 4K Sony smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable . Too much hassle
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating. If there is a power cut then the it is impossible to get the sound bar to connect to the TV again through the ARC HDMI socket. I have a SONY tv so you would think this would be easy to connect. Even after factory reset it still doesn't work. I have had enough of software not working and complicated set ups. I am very very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. User friendly early to connect. Cinema effects sound is my fave. Crisp and clear sound with great bass. You can obviously change sound effects according to your needs. Can be connected to your any Bluetooth device. Would highlu recommend for house use!
customer_reviews.author: M aslam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing..so wish i.d bought it sooner ..sounds like the pictures..tv is only 2 years old always muffled on films ..now it is so clear ..
customer_reviews.author: Dito

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & simple set up
customer_reviews.text: I was suspicious of getting a Sony product at such a Low price, thinking It might not be great. I’m pleased to say it’s so simple to set up & we’re really happy with the sound & volume. There will of course be better sounding & more powerful sound bars around but not at such a good price. If you want great quality & an excellent sound at a reasonable price this is a super buy.
customer_reviews.author: mr g j hollier

customer_reviews.title: Low price, sound quality and tones similar to sony TV
customer_reviews.text: Interesting functions on sound bar, including reflector of sony remote control instructions. The ability to turn TV and Sound Bar on and off- sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - life changing
customer_reviews.text: I have a brand new TV but the speakers aren't up to much. So this looked like a good alternative and I'm not disappointed. So great to have a product that works. Absolutely changed my viewing life
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: The sound that comes from this expensive slab of plastic is somehow muddy and tinny at the same time. Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, nice build quality and well worth getting. Only negative is purely subjective but I thought the surround sound effect was a bit weak, not as effective as a sound base I already own.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the ARC function
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised by the amount of reviews stating great sound. I don't consider myself fussy or an audiophile by any means but I found the sound disappointing and at normal listening levels only marginally better than the TV speakers. The main reason I bought the item was for the ARC function but it worked so intermittently that it gave me the hump so I've sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: MR A.

customer_reviews.title: Great t value.
customer_reviews.text: For the money an excellent product. Be aware on certain tv's you may need a adapter for the optic cable. These cost about £10 from Sony.
customer_reviews.author: David Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased
customer_reviews.text: Connected to my TV to enhance the sound quality and have found a great improvement, easy to install and remote works well.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Lawson

customer_reviews.title: would not turn on
customer_reviews.text: it was a small step up from my tv speakers, then on day four,it would not turn on,so returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: r chamley

customer_reviews.title: Good sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present to boost my other half’s tv sound. It works a treat - great sound - especially the cinema option. Set up was easy. One very happy boyfriend at Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: JFB

customer_reviews.title: Great, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar, needed a bit of fiddling with the tv config, but otherwise very simple. Makes a HUGE difference with movies.
customer_reviews.author: tenjin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Idiot proof trust me Plug in and turn on that easy The infrared function lets you put it in front of the TV sensor without a problem
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been looking for to amplify the sound production of my TV in has only arrived 5 mins it's connected and set to my TV and boom the sound is fabulous
customer_reviews.author: F. V. Ola

customer_reviews.title: The speakers in the TV were good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the BlueTooth facility in the sound bar I wouldn't have bothered.
customer_reviews.author: OverSpender

customer_reviews.title: good sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality and the remote works well having regular batteries instead of the usual coin type ones.
customer_reviews.author: daveyG

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who loves it. Very easy to fit. I used the optical lead which just plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James R. Dales

product_meta.title: Sony HT-SF150 2ch Single Soundbar with Bluetooth and S-Force Front Surround, Black 220 Volts (Not for USA), European Cord
product_meta.description:
Perfectly designed for entertainment - Enjoy your favorite TV shows in enhanced sound quality delivered by this 2 channel soundbar with a Bass Reflex speaker. The HT-SF150’s slim profile design fits easily in your home and sits comfortably within any interiors. Perfect pairing and simple connectivity with your TV - Connecting to your TV has never been easier. With HDMI ARC, one cable gives an easy connection for all your TV audio. You can control both with just one remote. Enjoy all your music - Connect via USB to play your favorite tunes or stream wirelessly over Bluetooth. Bass Reflex speaker - A speaker that delivers punchy bass without compromising detail and clarity, perfect for enjoying TV shows and music.

Box Contains

1 x Remote Control
Batteries for remote commander
Optical Cable
AC Cord
feature_bullets: Powerful surround sound thanks to S-Force front surround and bass reflex
Simple connectivity: one easy HDMI connection to TV and instant music listening from your mobile device via Bluetooth or USB
Elegant, slim design with soft edges to effortlessly place in front of your TV or wall-mount
The two speaker setup delivers front surround sound from a compact unit
Send audio and control information from your TV using just one cable with HDMI ARC

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars535 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
